website_summaries.verdict: It may be pricey, but the Acer Predator XB271HK is a 27-inch Ultra-High-Definition (UHD) gaming monitor that comes up big in terms of performance, features, and style.
pros: Superb gaming, color, and gray-scale performance
Supports G-Sync anti-tearing and smoothing technology

customer_reviews.title: Screen suffers from a flicker/glitch every once in a while ...
customer_reviews.text: Screen suffers from a flicker/glitch every once in a while. There are 18+ pages on the Acer website regarding this issue, however Acer are not acknowledging that there is an issue? I'll be returning mine to Amazon for a refund. Defective goods.
customer_reviews.author: mremulator

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, save yourself the agro and do not buy this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, save yourself the agro and do not buy this monitor. It looks amazing and the picture is terrific but it has a design fault where the chips that run the panel cannot handle the resolution and periodically crash causing at best a single frame or two of corruption on the half of the screen run by the chip that crashes. The internet and this page are full of people with the same issue and it look years for Acer to admit to the issue. Do you want to buy a £700 monitor only to have to RMA it and probably end up with a 2nd hand reworked panel in your new monitor?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this monitor for just over a year and here’s what I think of it. The 1440p 144 ( 165hz overclocked) looks pretty good, great for gaming and the higher resolution means you get more screen real estate, the colours are pretty accurate and the viewing angles are decent. For the price, I think you’re getting a solid brand name monitor, that looks sleek and stylish and looks great on my setup.
customer_reviews.author: Brad  mcgreavy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There is this weird flickering that I can't fix and I am most likely going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Yha

customer_reviews.title: Not for competitive PvP gaming and FPS
customer_reviews.text: Think carefully before purchasing this. The refresh rate is omitted from the priduct description and is only 60Hz (which drops to 50Hz at 1920*1080 on certain inputs). If you're playing anything competitive, you wont have a frame rate/refresh rate advantage and it wont run any smoother. If you're playing Skyrim by yourself and want to experience it in all its visual majesty then sure, but if you're buying it for FPS's, steer clear and get one of the smaller sized IPS monitors at 144Hz. Sending mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Will G

customer_reviews.title: Backlight Bleeding!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor have great 4K display however if you bother about backlight bleeding then be aware that I had excessive one which was really annoying when you have dark scene. I know IPS panels are suffering with this issue a lot but I can't accept in that level. Sent it back and I bought ultra wide Dell AW3418DW and very happy with it, very minimal backlight bleeding and great display.
customer_reviews.author: M.K

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love it, its really smooth for gaming if you have a graphic card+cpu good enough to have 165 fps at 2K. And if you are tired and your pc is at your room is really convinient, because is super ease to turn it or put it higher and watch something while laying on the bed. The speakers are nice aswell. I really like it. The only thing I don't like is that it needs to be on in order to use the extra usb ports, and it needs to be connected to the pc aswell with other cable so I see no use on it.
customer_reviews.author: Basilio Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: A very capable monitor... but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. A great upgrade. Looks sharp, interface is not bad and I love that I get a headphone output and some speakers (they're terrible but great in a pinch and I do end up using them) !!BUT!! I was led to believe that the 4K XB271HK would overclock to 75hz when using G-Sync... but this does not appear to be the case. It seems that everybody online agrees. There is no option for this and I can't get the panel above 60. It's not a massive problem for me but I am very disappointed as I do occasionally use this monitor for FPS gaming
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Collis

customer_reviews.title: Great on the second try.
customer_reviews.text: First unit had horrible backlight bleed and a cluster if dead pixels. Amazon replaced next day (Amazon returns really are amazing) and allowed me to send the faulty unit back within 30 days at no extra charge to me. The monitor is great quality. Sharp as hell, good colour depth and g-sync. My only complaint is I don't like the stand colour... but we cant have it all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these screens and they are simply the best I've seen on a GTX 980TI SLI rig .. 4K gaming, 4K 3D Studio max modelling .. works wonderfully with those apps and my word I just ran up DOOM from Bethesda on them (I decided to run it on 1 screen though) and it's smooth as butter with the NVidia GSync. One thing to note, I bought these from the UK and had them shipped to mainland Europe but I notice the seller doesn't do this anymore as soon as they arrived ... note that there are many ex-pats from the UK that live in mainland Europe and prefer to buy with their pound sterling currency !
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great apart from IPS glow...
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with my screen until I started looking at images with dark backgrounds the horror that is ips glow was revealed, the picture makes it look worse than it is (can see the bottom corners are the culprits)... Packaging also wasn't in best condition so wouldn't surprise me if this occurred in transit. Still expect much better at this price and will be keeping my review at 1 star unless the replacement is better... Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I literally cant go back to being satisfied with 60hz now that ive had 144hz
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think i needed this monitor, now i cant game without being at 144hz. (obviously having the equipment to push that many pixels in the first place is a necessity) but this unit is well built, easy to use and a pleasure to look at.
customer_reviews.author: TinoD

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant monitor. Mine was flawless
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor. Mine was flawless, no faults, no dead pixels, no backlight bleed. The colours of this panel are excellent. The picture is very sharp at 1440p. Very high refresh rate, overclockable to 165hz. G-sync is brilliant. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Great 1440p monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Switched from a standard 1080p monitor to this beast and was not left disappointed. The refresh rate ass mind blowing and the picture quality was great. One complaint I did have though was that I found a little bit of colour banding and light spots on the monitor that I was given, a little bit disappointing considering how much I paid to be honest. But other than that the monitor is great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connor B

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is fantastic. So much better than my previous one. 144hz is so silky smooth. I noticed a few issues when I went up to 165 but my computer can't get that high anyway so I'm quite happy to stick at 144 and it works great. The colours are great. The image quality is great. The user interface and buttons are pretty confusing, but you won't have to fiddle with them too often so that's not too much of an issue. Overall, I'd totally recommend this monitor. Low latency, high resolution, high framerate, large size g-sync What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clucas

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. The picture quality is amazing and I love how easy it is to adjust the height of the monitor. There are so many options to chose from in terms of brightness, contrast, dark boost etc. The only downside is maybe that I have to manually switch between the ports, even if only one of the devices is turned on. Since I have my PC and PS4 hooked up with the screen, it's a bit annoying. Having said that, it's a great monitor. (Also please note that it's quite heavy, so be careful)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panels ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine and I love the quality, size and just how responsive it is. Not happy because mine is experiencing some bleeding in all 4 corners so I am deciding if I am going to send it back or not. The panels on these are really a lottery!
customer_reviews.author: Endre Peterfi

customer_reviews.title: Screen tearing-kind of Started Appearing within a year of purchase
customer_reviews.text: The monitor definitely is a value for money.. It pretty much delivers almost the same quality as the ASUS ROG SWIFT PG279Q for a cheaper price. Difference is barely noticeable. Only downside is the durability of the monitor. You get what you paid for. Poor quality that lasted only a year (barely). If you're buying this monitor, make sure to get an extended warranty (I didn't and I wish I did). But overall experience, its decent. Wish I invested on a much expensive monitor i.e. PG279Q that certainly last a lot longer than Acer.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Half decent but not overly impressed..
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is decent, it’s well made but i can’t justify the price... The screen looks very stylish and the actual panel is fairly decent but it’s not overly impressive... I’m not overly impressed with this monitor something is missing and I can’t put my finger on it... I would look elsewhere...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor! I used first 4k tv for a while as a monitor it sucked,after that i got myself an ultrawide monitor 34" it was awesome but it was curved so it was not the best for a little bit of photo editing. So i sold it and got this one,and i love it. Its fantastic for gaming and productivity. Also backlight bleed is almost non existant very minimal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Monitor broke down within 6months haven’t been able to service? Auwfull service from the company , never again that’s all I can say
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor cost me £599 at the time and I was a little concerned as it's just a monitor and after reading the reviews about tearing / bleeding + it only runs at 60hz was a risk for gaming but honestly the quality of the monitor, the G-SYNC to my GTX 1080 ti i have no issue's what so ever and get high fps on all games even in 4k mode. If this helps i will be buying a 2nd one :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fox

customer_reviews.title: G sync compatibility, sturdy build
customer_reviews.text: great quality moniter, silky smooth framerates and zero tearing due to g-sync. build quality is fantastic and has a very solid stand. even though it is zero frame the picture does no meet the edge of the display (approx 5mm gap around), originally using the monitor it bugged me but after while of heavy usage it is now not immediately noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Top Class Screen
customer_reviews.text: I have had absolutely no issues with the screen and I was a little concerned based on some of the negative reviews on this page. It's such a great gaming monitor. Takes gaming up to a whole new level. Simple to set up and go. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Velcro

customer_reviews.title: White line across the screen!
customer_reviews.text: I keep having this white line from across the screen, its not always there but it comes and goes its sort of getting worse lately. Ive only had the monitor for about one week now I guess am gonna have to ask for a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality monitor but
customer_reviews.text: it has two important issues: First issue is the ips glow, the blacks are grey and this is very annoying in dark expecially for the price of the monitor. Second issue is the brightness , it should have a light sensor or a dedicated button because it takes too much time to go through the menu and you will end up to keep always the same brightness on dark room or daylight. Except for the blacks, the picture quality is very good, the colours are accurates, large view angles and very detailed with 4k resolution. Integrated audio speakers are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: BAD LOW LIGHT AND COLOUR BANDING
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this monitor!! Have been back and forth with the acer repair centre twice now and still the picture on my monitor has terrible low light issues where smooth dark lighting becomes all green with lots of screen banding. Since I have been sent back this monitor twice I can only assume this is standard for this monitor and would not recommend buying, go for a Dell with the same specs and similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Light bleed is awful - avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't possibly recommend this monitor for anyone, it has so much light bleed around the edges and the viewing angles are terrible. For the price this costs as well, issues like these should be picked up in basic QA tests! Will be returning mine as it isn't fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: TN but I love it. DOWNGRADED from 4K monitor
customer_reviews.text: TN but I love it. DOWNGRADED from 4K monitor. 165Hz on 1440p is different league, you wont look back to 1080p. Need strong card to power it up! "1080 TI ,Battlefield 1 130+FPS maybe the answer"
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Second unit I have received now and still suffers frame corruption errors. two different DP cables used with no joy the only way to fix the problems was by disabling GSYNC. Thank god I purchased this from amazon because there return policy is the gold standard.
customer_reviews.author: Phill m

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels are a possibility. But delivers as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Stand - very robust and easy to adjust Picture - clear and colourful. Great range of colour and depth. Very smooth 144hz with g sync, as expected. The dead pixel close to the middle of the screen? - noticeable but I can live with that. Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: brilliant product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor. So far, I've experienced no problems, after reading other reviews, I was a little apprehensive but certainly glad I decided to buy this monitor. If you've got the PC power to support 4k, then this will do you proud. The image is crystal clear and stunning. Aesthetically, the monitor looks brilliant, the stand is sturdy and experienced no wobbling when typing, using a steering wheel on racing games. This comes with both a HDMI cable and a DisplayPort 1.2 cable.
customer_reviews.author: K Watson

customer_reviews.title: but altogether very pleased with this one
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, if quite expensive 4k IPS monitor with NVidia g-sync. No dead pixels and IPS backlight bleed only just noticable in dark scenes. Takes a bit of tweaking to get the colour mapping looking reasonable, but altogether very pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: PrawnDhansak

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor ! Very very happy with this purchase. Stunning picture, no dead pixels, no backlight bleed and i even like the design ! Currently 980ti @ 1530 core + gsync makes gaming very smooth. Of course the 1080 and upcoming 1080ti would be better suited to drive 4k. I had a 21:9 X34 before this and while gaming is pretty engaging, i just couldn't get used to regular browsing/youtube/twitch on that aspect ratio. Changed to this and i couldn't be happier. If you are on the lookout for a stunning gaming 4k display you cant really do better right now until the 100hz+ 4k displays start arriving.
customer_reviews.author: Acs

customer_reviews.title: Most Beautiful Monitor I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This Monitor has all the necessary essentials for gaming including the expensive G-SYNC (which is amazing) however, i would say it lacks in normal day use. Colour accuracy in dark pictures and movies is not the best, you are able to see the different gradients of colour which gets annoying quickly. Also the screen Matt is too intense for me and ruins some of the crispness of the picture Quality. However, everything else is amazing and would recommend for gamers of all kind, though it will be more worthwhile if the product is on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing
customer_reviews.text: I noticed older reviews are saying defects came, I don't know if that still happens anymore, got mine and was in perfect condition. The image quality is amazing (obviously it isn't as vibrant as a IPS but this isn't an IPS display), it feels buttery smooth. And is customisable in so many ways. The screen has absolutely loads of tilting and height variety. Finally, it has G-Sync to top it all off. Excellent monitor and I highly advise anyone looking at this to get one.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Gaming monitor 🤗, pixel issue 😑 💔
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice gaming monitor, the only down side that when I received it had spots/dots on the screen, one red and one green. (pixel faulty) I have read about it, and on some forum people posted that if you 'massage' it gently with a fibre cloth it will be gone, so I had to do it few times and it is gone, I hope it is not coming back and I don't need to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Edina Lakatos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality build and good picture
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but has a great picture with good colour. Heavy solid stand with lots of adjustment. Even the height adjusts with just the push of a finger.
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: running with 980ti this montor is great beign a person with bad eye sight got this ...
customer_reviews.text: running with 980ti this montor is great beign a person with bad eye sight got this so cuold see things a bit bigger looking down gun sights no problem any more was so happy that the 4k and gsync work so well maxed out on rainbow six no problem the crew plays realy well as well with settings in some places on max if yo can aford it would reconmend bf4 runs on ultra at 4k and bf1 had it running between high and very high cant wait to play bf1
customer_reviews.author: r maloney

customer_reviews.title: you wont be disappointed for a G-Sync screen in its size and display ...
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews, make the decision and buy, you wont be disappointed for a G-Sync screen in its size and display abilities. Just dont hang out any hope on the audio which you should completely ignore its afterthought presence.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDad

customer_reviews.title: Quality premium monitor.  Acer flagship monitor 2017.
customer_reviews.text: Immediately you can see the monitor is a quality build. The stand and monitor frame are all solid quality. The screen is huge. Make sure you have a really big desk. The quality of the picture is excellent, but you would expect that for this premium price. if you have the money it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Luckily mine doesn't suffer from crazy amount of black light bleed unlike some of the pictires i have seen posted by others. In overall it's a pretty good monitor, very well built and looks awesome. Moving from 60hz monitor to this made night and day difference especially at games like CS GO and Insurgency Sandstorm. Just make sure your GPU is good enough to handle the resolution at that FPS. I'm running 1080ti with i9 9900k.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas Dolen

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor...My son loves it...No problems whats so ever...even after nearly 2yrs of use!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Glen Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Having this monitor for several weeks now and I must ...
customer_reviews.text: Having this monitor for several weeks now and I must say I am impressed. Large screen allows you to arrange everything, some times I have 4 windosw open each of 16". Chrispy picture, vivd colours and of course gsync. I can get 60 FPS with my old gtx980ti in almost all games on high/ultra settings. Please note you will have to lock FPS using some additional add lice nvidia inspector to have your gsync working properly. I even can live with this flickering issue for now as it does not happens that often.(if you do not know this is a panel issue, so expect it).
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, better than 34" ultra wide
customer_reviews.text: I had a 34" ultra wide monitor but couldn't get used to the resolution, having this screen in this size @ 4K is much easier to use for work and games look much sharper IMO. I'm running a 980Ti and don't notice any lag in games like SW:BF.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELWILKINSON

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality and buttery smooth
customer_reviews.text: Slightly high price but coming from a 60hz monitor to this is well worth the cost. Great image quality and buttery smooth, flicker free movement constantly thanks to G-sync and the high refresh rate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: like others have said before me this screen is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this screen, the only problem is that it sometime has a blurred line across the screen which I can't quite figure out the reason behind but it's fixable by just turning the screen on and off. Also, like others have said before me this screen is a hit and miss, my first screen had stuck pixels after a day so I took another chance and ordered a replacement. I've had no issues so far with this one and will hopefully enjoy it for a while to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine with my Linux Ubuntu 16
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine with my Linux Ubuntu 16.04 as long as I used the Nvidia drivers. As I dislike having the screen on standby I always switch it off when not in use, and I would like if the on/off switch was more accessible for example by being on the front of the screen or on the side instead of on the rear.
customer_reviews.author: mikeo

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Had this monitor for 6 months now. It is excellent. The colours are amazing and running games at 4k is terrific. A 32inch monitor makes all the difference in gaming. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: sanman

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of the three monitors was faulty
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, I love ACER, I had two of their monitors previously and they're still work horses to this day. But watch that video, its so weird, its like the pixels have shifted to the right of the screen? Replacement inbound - I'll keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Boulton

customer_reviews.title: great screen
customer_reviews.text: good value for money, great design,easy to use and it has got many features
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: It has great response time
customer_reviews.text: It has great response time, great color, and is very easy on the eyes. Overall, I am very happy with this monitor and would recommend anyone who is looking at this monitor to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: It works beautifully, the stand is a piece of art
customer_reviews.text: I know it is expensive, but it is a lovely monitor. It works beautifully, the stand is a piece of art.. excellent build quality. Seller did a great job, Very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is ok. But not worth money by that time
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: Top of the range.
customer_reviews.text: The best monitor I've ever used. This is my second acer monitor I prefer it over the others I have tried, the specs are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Risky

customer_reviews.title: 28 inch - Superb Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Superb minister for the cost. Image is fantastic, easy to set up and use. The stand well made, robust, easy to adjust and will look good on any gamer’s desk. Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: Mind Blowing Good
customer_reviews.text: Lovely in Every Aspect. This is my first experience with 4K, Predator Brand and GSync .. and I would say that the experience is mind blowing. Price is a bit on the high side, but this is expected on a product that premium. If you are looking for the best large monitor, this is highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Adnan

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft has never looked so good!
customer_reviews.text: Such a mighty image you may weep when you gaze upon it's pixels! Seriously though, a great display with g sync, 4K and frankly some nice bragging rights!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor especially when on sale
customer_reviews.text: G-sync makes it a lot more expensive than expected but it just means that it is approved by Nvidia. Real good for just about everything
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Any gamer who want to upgrade his monitor should only buy this the cost has come down a lot over the years to where i think its ok to buy now and it really does help for first person shooters and 2k still looks great for any RPG
customer_reviews.author: s theaker

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: 99% of the time it great, but every now and then there is a weird line down the screen, just happens for a split second when watching youtube or netflix, and it does not happen when playing games or watching a movie I own, still it stops me from giving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: antony gowland

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant monitor
customer_reviews.text: A awesome 4k monitor never had acer products over asus great monitor with the titan x graphics card superb pic quality definitely worth 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant monitor. Slightly dark in light levels but crisp ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor. Slightly dark in light levels but crisp picture
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and works great with the g-sync. Easy to set up as well. If you have the money the picture quality is worth the cost. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: William Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Crisp!
customer_reviews.text: It's a real treat for the eyes! Went from a bog standard 1080 60hz, to this absolute beast - Looking at anything else just makes me realise how good this is. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Stainsby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality easy to use and has a very fine design especially with the stand that can also turn your monitor left and right
customer_reviews.author: Rudis Tiskus

customer_reviews.title: Very bad at dark images (TN model)
customer_reviews.text: TN model has very bad colour banding / blocking when displaying near-black images. Really awful for playing dark games. I should have returned the item really.
customer_reviews.author: UmBongo

customer_reviews.title: Acer Predator XB271HKbmiprz 27 Inch UHD
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with the quality of the monitor/panel. Plenty of backlight bleeding :( I was so happy to have one, and after one day had to send it back without really knowing if they will be able to repair it :S
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Clouding
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with very bad clouding on my monitor sending back probably just unlucky but for the price very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: T800

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice monitor, Great for gaming, But not IPS so the quality of the colors isn't the best. Overall - Great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, uses the same panel as the rog swift. My only problem with it is the speakers aren't great which is probably why it's much cheaper than the rog.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Craig Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming monitor, 4k is the way to go, works perfect with new computer.
customer_reviews.author: leslie dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best 4k 32" gaming screen available.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, live colors, G-SYNC making a huge improvement (previous 4k display didn't support it). For 800-900 US $ it offers great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: yakir frank

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product that arrived 2 days ealier than expected. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: XB281HKbmiprz has tearing issues - search web for this known issue. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Delivers optimum gaming results
customer_reviews.text: Amazing when paired with a g-sync graphics card and capable of 144hz
customer_reviews.author: hard hat

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product used for PC gaming and very happy would recommend
customer_reviews.author: nicky

customer_reviews.title: This is a great monitor. I've had it for a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. I've had it for a couple of weeks now and it not disappointed. I have it connected to my mac mostly but use the HMDI connection to watch tv in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor in the world! I bought it 2 years ago, and it still works reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming
customer_reviews.text: A very good quality and also very good for games
customer_reviews.author: Costin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor, even with it being a TN panel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, even with it being a TN panel, it has a brilliant picture. The high refresh rate is excellent,
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Lovely monitor. No backlight bleed or dead pixels. Great for gaming and also 3d app work (Maya, Zbrush etc), a great all-rounder.
customer_reviews.author: Billybob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, expensive but worth the extra pennies!! Completely satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: John Coates

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great monitor. White back light bleed is only noticeable when screen is black.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality control
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this monitor. It looks great but I had to return the first one for two stuck pixels and the second when the displayport connection stopped working. The second also had two dead pixels which I was willing to accept as they were less obvious, but without displayport, it's missing its gsync and high refresh functions and just not worth the bother. I'm now looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Ticks all the boxes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I've recently upgraded from a 1080p TN screen to the ACER XB281HK (also TN). There is absolutely no light bleed, and it works straight out of the box. The colors are very vivid, and with G-SYNC, games looks crisp and tear-free. Are viewing angles not as good as ISP? perhaps, however who looks at their PC monitor from the side when using it? Most consumers will find this screen ticks all the boxes and I'm so happy I made the jump to 4K with this Acer product.
customer_reviews.author: Boeing

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't normally leave feedback but this really deserves my time! Been looking for a gaming monitor for about 3 weeks,did alot of research tho it just made the decision even harder! Very nervous after I'd ordered this monitor but oh my God absolutely gorgeous... So chuffed so glad I brought this one (not much to compare to but buy cheap buy twice!!) stunning colours stunning gaming graphics definitely improved... Very pricey but I'm really happy for what I want very quick delivery and gorgeous looking monitor, bigger than expected but so amazing very happy! Won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jason melton

customer_reviews.title: Used - Like New -  Well worth  it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used one of these from Amazon with great intrepidation, £600 for a used or 2nd hand device, I did intially think it was one that had been sent back due to light bleed or Bad bad pixel death. luckily I seem to be one of the fortunate ones, at least for now. I seem to have got one of the good panels, no dead pixels and very minimal light bleed. I was using this as a step up to eventually getting an OLED display in years to come so I'm very happy I got this particular panel. I was lucky but it can be a lottery as to whether you get a good one or not.
customer_reviews.author: Sol3

customer_reviews.title: Great picture... But
customer_reviews.text: So I've tried gaming, watching tv, films, and workon this thing and it by far proves its worth with buttery smooth image and wonderful colour range. So far I've had several people look at this thing and say it's almost like they're looking out a window rather than a flat tv. But with that said the speakers are awful. I mean this when I say it that it almost sounds like I'm listening to a pair of headphones turned up to full sitting on the desk beside me. Whilst the picture is fantastic and I find the build nice and strong, if you are interested in this which I suggest you should be... By a set of separate speakers!
customer_reviews.author: LcmacD

customer_reviews.title: Works great no screen tearing
customer_reviews.text: My first 4k monitor with g sync. Works great no screen tearing. screen is not ips still looks amazing. Had a dead pixel and little light leaks around the side nothing to direct you. Sound form the monitor is bad. You will need external speakers or head phones for good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nuruz

customer_reviews.title: its a great monitor with great features but seems to be plagued ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had two so far the first developed a dead pixel after a day of use the second has developed a stuck pixel after a little over a week for over £500 this is not the level of quality i would expect, its a great monitor with great features but seems to be plagued with simple faults
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Horrid washed out colours and terrible black, spend extra for the IPS version
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning this horrid lighting/blacks while gaming, even worse when watching moves. Ended up packing it up and going back to my 3 year old 1080P Samsung monitor. Which seems to have much better picture quality, better backs. Didn't really trust the reviews but can honestly say pay the extra and go for the IPS version!
customer_reviews.author: Mac9587

customer_reviews.title: excellent monitor, but.. acer should recall them for recalibration/re-release
customer_reviews.text: great monitor for gaming but.. do not buy.. there's a known issue from Acers quality control where the desktop isn't centered to the screen so the bezels arent matched up and there's mirroring to one side.. RMA'd instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kaye

customer_reviews.title: luving the dream
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor the moment it was delivered to my home. For one it's 4K and for two it's HUGE! So far, I'm not having any issues with it. Great to watch Netflix and all but I'll need to upgrade my GPU for GTX 1080TI --Gaming set at the ultimate level :) If i'm still giving this 5 star in the long haul then I'm still living the dream!
customer_reviews.author: Freelance1066

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the screen. Flashing icons & screen flashing ...
customer_reviews.text: Problem with the screen. Flashing icons & screen flashing white in the background. I returned this item but the company said they had tested it & couldn't find s fault. I have asked for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. Campion

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. Looks amazing and the improvement from my 10 year old Dell (albeit at 1920x1200) is a big step up.
customer_reviews.author: C Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Worth money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it 2 of December and it came next day, this screen is really good and worth the mocame in protected package.
customer_reviews.author: M.B

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Service
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to excessive IPS backlight glow. Two weeks and still no refund despite promises of fasttracking this.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Coates

customer_reviews.title: fantastic and what a price i paid 450
customer_reviews.text: fantastic and what a price i paid 450.00 for it if your a gamer then this is for you .....but i high end graphics card will be needed for the 144/165 refresh rates
customer_reviews.author: dutch11980

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing panel, top top quality - no issues with dead pixels or anything. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Acer Predator XB271HKbmiprz 27 Inch UHD Gaming Monitor, Black (IPS Panel, G-Sync, 4ms, ZeroFrame, DP, HDMI, USB Hub, Height Adjustable Stand)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:27| Style Name:UHD, IPS, 60Hz

This Full HD LED monitor with 50,000,000:1 high contrast ratio and HDMI interface is optimised for a fine image and colour quality.

This approach extends to the sturdy stand and slim profile without compromising style in ensuring stability and durability. It features Smart View technology that can adjust colour parameters to deliver the same image quality and colours with straight viewing.

Game with no compromise. Super-fast refresh rates and IPScolor come in an aggressive new design.

Advanced IPSpanel technology provides the best color without compromising any speed. See game worlds in all their glorious colors.

Everything's better with more pixels. A 2560 x 1440 WQHD resolution makes textures crisp and clear. As you know, it's a resolution sweet spot for high-speed gaming.

Two is better than one. Enjoy immersive multiple-monitor setups with ZeroFrame bezels that keep you in the game.

NVIDIAG-SYNCcreates a smooth gaming experience by syncing frames rendered by your GPU to the refresh rate of your monitor. This advanced process completely eliminates screen tearing and minimizes stuttering.

BOX CONTAINS
Acer XB271HKbmiprz

































BOX CONTAINS
Acer XB271HKbmiprz
feature_bullets: Experience a whole new smooth, NVidia G-Sync eliminates screen tearing and minimizes stuttering for legendary PC gaming
Minimize motion blur and zip through space with 144Hz native refresh rate, now that is fast
Conquer your enemies with Predator game view, shooting aim-points and customizable gaming profiles give you the upper hand
Predator EyeProtect's flicker-less, Blue-light filter, comfy view and low-dimming technologies minimize eye-strain from long gaming sessions
The futuristic aluminium base design with matte finish and zero frame bezels level-up your desk
